verses.verse: And the ark<WH727> of the LORD<WH3068> was<WH1961> in the country<WH7704> of the Philistines<WH6430> seven<WH7651> months.<WH2320>

And the Philistines<WH6430> called<WH7121> for the priests<WH3548> and the diviners,<WH7080> saying,<WH559> What<WH4100> shall we do<WH6213> to the ark<WH727> of the LORD?<WH3068> tell<WH3045> us wherewith<WH4100> we shall send<WH7971> it to his place.<WH4725>

And they said,<WH559> If<WH518> ye send away<WH7971> <WH853> the ark<WH727> of the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> send<WH7971> it not<WH408> empty;<WH7387> but<WH3588> in any wise return<WH7725> <WH7725> him a trespass offering:<WH817> then<WH227> ye shall be healed,<WH7495> and it shall be known<WH3045> to you why<WH4100> his hand<WH3027> is not<WH3808> removed<WH5493> from<WH4480> you.

Then said<WH559> they, What<WH4100> shall be the trespass offering<WH817> which<WH834> we shall return<WH7725> to him? They answered,<WH559> Five<WH2568> golden<WH2091> emerods,<WH6076> and five<WH2568> golden<WH2091> mice,<WH5909> according to the number<WH4557> of the lords<WH5633> of the Philistines:<WH6430> for<WH3588> one<WH259> plague<WH4046> was on you all,<WH3605> and on your lords.<WH5633>

Wherefore ye shall make<WH6213> images<WH6754> of your emerods,<WH6076> and images<WH6754> of your mice<WH5909> that mar<WH7843> <WH853> the land;<WH776> and ye shall give<WH5414> glory<WH3519> unto the God<WH430> of Israel:<WH3478> peradventure<WH194> he will lighten<WH7043> <WH853> his hand<WH3027> from off<WH4480> <WH5921> you, and from off<WH4480> <WH5921> your gods,<WH430> and from off<WH4480> <WH5921> your land.<WH776>

Wherefore <WH4100> then do ye harden<WH3513> <WH853> your hearts,<WH3824> as<WH834> the Egyptians<WH4714> and Pharaoh<WH6547> hardened<WH3513> <WH853> their hearts?<WH3820> when<WH834> he had wrought wonderfully<WH5953> among them, did they not<WH3808> let the people go,<WH7971> and they departed?<WH1980>

Now <WH6258> therefore make<WH6213> a<WH259> new<WH2319> cart,<WH5699> and take<WH3947> two<WH8147> milch<WH5763> kine,<WH6510> on<WH5921> which<WH834> there hath come<WH5927> no<WH3808> yoke,<WH5923> and tie<WH631> <WH853> the kine<WH6510> to the cart,<WH5699> and bring<WH7725> their calves<WH1121> home<WH1004> from<WH4480> <WH310> them:

And take<WH3947> <WH853> the ark<WH727> of the LORD,<WH3068> and lay<WH5414> it upon<WH413> the cart;<WH5699> and put<WH7760> the jewels<WH3627> of gold,<WH2091> which<WH834> ye return<WH7725> him for a trespass offering,<WH817> in a coffer<WH712> by the side<WH4480> <WH6654> thereof; and send it away,<WH7971> <WH853> that it may go.<WH1980>

And see,<WH7200> if<WH518> it goeth up<WH5927> by the way<WH1870> of his own coast<WH1366> to Beth-shemesh,<WH1053> then he<WH1931> hath done<WH6213> us<WH853> this<WH2063> great<WH1419> evil:<WH7451> but if<WH518> not,<WH3808> then we shall know<WH3045> that<WH3588> it is not<WH3808> his hand<WH3027> that smote<WH5060> us: it<WH1931> was a chance<WH4745> that happened<WH1961> to us.

And the men<WH376> did<WH6213> so;<WH3651> and took<WH3947> two<WH8147> milch<WH5763> kine,<WH6510> and tied<WH631> them to the cart,<WH5699> and shut up<WH3607> their calves<WH1121> at home: <WH1004>

And they laid<WH7760> <WH853> the ark<WH727> of the LORD<WH3068> upon<WH413> the cart,<WH5699> and the coffer<WH712> with<WH854> the mice<WH5909> of gold<WH2091> and the images<WH6754> of their emerods.<WH2914>

And the kine<WH6510> took the straight<WH3474> way<WH1870> to<WH5921> the way<WH1870> of Beth-shemesh,<WH1053> and went along<WH1980> the<WH259> highway,<WH4546> lowing<WH1600> as they went,<WH1980> and turned not aside<WH5493> <WH3808> to the right hand<WH3225> or to the left;<WH8040> and the lords<WH5633> of the Philistines<WH6430> went<WH1980> after<WH310> them unto<WH5704> the border<WH1366> of Beth-shemesh.<WH1053>

And they of Beth-shemesh<WH1053> were reaping<WH7114> their wheat<WH2406> harvest<WH7105> in the valley:<WH6010> and they lifted up<WH5375> <WH853> their eyes,<WH5869> and saw<WH7200> <WH853> the ark,<WH727> and rejoiced<WH8055> to see<WH7200> it.

And the cart<WH5699> came<WH935> into<WH413> the field<WH7704> of Joshua,<WH3091> a Beth-shemite,<WH1030> and stood<WH5975> there,<WH8033> where<WH8033> there was a great<WH1419> stone:<WH68> and they cleaved<WH1234> <WH853> the wood<WH6086> of the cart,<WH5699> and offered<WH5927> the kine<WH6510> a burnt offering<WH5930> unto the LORD.<WH3068>

And the Levites<WH3881> took down<WH3381> <WH853> the ark<WH727> of the LORD,<WH3068> and the coffer<WH712> that<WH834> was with<WH854> it, wherein<WH834> the jewels<WH3627> of gold<WH2091> were, and put<WH7760> them on<WH413> the great<WH1419> stone:<WH68> and the men<WH376> of Beth-shemesh<WH1053> offered<WH5927> burnt offerings<WH5930> and sacrificed<WH2076> sacrifices<WH2077> the same<WH1931> day<WH3117> unto the LORD.<WH3068>
And when the five<WH2568> lords<WH5633> of the Philistines<WH6430> had seen<WH7200> it, they returned<WH7725> to Ekron<WH6138> the same<WH1931> day.<WH3117>

And these<WH428> are the golden<WH2091> emerods<WH2914> which<WH834> the Philistines<WH6430> returned<WH7725> for a trespass offering<WH817> unto the LORD;<WH3068> for Ashdod<WH795> one,<WH259> for Gaza<WH5804> one,<WH259> for Askelon<WH831> one,<WH259> for Gath<WH1661> one,<WH259> for Ekron<WH6138> one;<WH259>

And the golden<WH2091> mice,<WH5909> according to the number<WH4557> of all<WH3605> the cities<WH5892> of the Philistines<WH6430> belonging to the five<WH2568> lords,<WH5633> both of fenced cities,<WH4480> <WH5892> <WH4013> and of<WH5704> country<WH6521> villages,<WH3724> even unto<WH5704> the great<WH1419> stone of Abel,<WH59> whereon<WH834> <WH5921> they set down<WH5117> <WH853> the ark<WH727> of the LORD:<WH3068> which stone remaineth unto<WH5704> this<WH2088> day<WH3117> in the field<WH7704> of Joshua,<WH3091> the Beth-shemite.<WH1030>

And he smote<WH5221> the men<WH376> of Beth-shemesh,<WH1053> because<WH3588> they had looked<WH7200> into the ark<WH727> of the LORD,<WH3068> even he smote<WH5221> of the people<WH5971> fifty<WH2572> thousand<WH505> and threescore and ten<WH7657> men:<WH376> and the people<WH5971> lamented,<WH56> because<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> had smitten<WH5221> many of the people<WH5971> with a great<WH1419> slaughter.<WH4347>

And the men<WH376> of Beth-shemesh<WH1053> said,<WH559> Who<WH4310> is able<WH3201> to stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> this<WH2088> holy<WH6918> LORD<WH3068> God?<WH430> and to<WH413> whom<WH4310> shall he go up<WH5927> from<WH4480> <WH5921> us?

And they sent<WH7971> messengers<WH4397> to<WH413> the inhabitants<WH3427> of Kirjath-jearim,<WH7157> saying,<WH559> The Philistines<WH6430> have brought again<WH7725> <WH853> the ark<WH727> of the LORD;<WH3068> come ye down,<WH3381> and fetch it up<WH5927> <WH853> to<WH413> you.
